summary: A player home I made for my character Ziva David ( N.C.I.S )
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center]﻿[/center][b][font=Courier New][size=6][center]The Mossad[/center][/size]
[color=#ff0000][img]https://i.imgur.com/5YcLIUk.jpg[/img][/color]
[/font][/b][center][b][font=Courier New][size=4][color=#00ff00]As requested a save file of my Ziva David.[/color]
[color=#b4a7d6]Uploaded new file version,was missing a file.[/color]
NOTE:
This was hard to do because I use so many mods but I
limited them using the basic mods to get her loaded.
[i][u]I would like to make a stand alone but dont know how.[/u][/i]
Any help would be appreciated and still tweeking face.
See new Images especially my NMM image. That one shows 
exactly what I have loaded to load her.
[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]:
Ningheim Race and [u]all its requirements[/u]
Alternative Start-Live another Life
See NMM SS in images for an exact guide
to see what I have loaded to start her.
[color=#ff0000]MAJOR UPDATE FILE UPLOADED / FIX.[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#00ffff]I FORGOT TO UPLOAD THE GHOSU WEAPON PACK MOD ESP.
SO INSTALL THE UPDATE GHOSU ESP [/color][color=#ffd966]AFTER[/color][/size][color=#00ffff][size=3] YOU INSTALL GHOSU MOD.[/size]
[/color]
[color=#ff0000]﻿﻿[/color][/font][/b][size=3][b]Description[/b]
[/size]My personal stronghold home I made for my [size=3]Mossad character Ziva David from N.C.I.S.[/size][size=3]Warning! Includes very powerful weapons & shield
with black/gray textures.[/size][size=3]This mod I made for fun and totally optional.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b]Features[/b]
[/size][size=3]New textures on noble furniture in my home & Glaze ware items,[/size][size=3]Beds have sleep quest script,[/size][size=3]Master bedroom with armory storage,
[/size][size=3]Child's room-sleeps 2,[/size][size=3]Alchemy room with enchanting benches,[/size][size=3]Kitchen area, a few crafting items outside, back of home.[/size][size=3]Re-spawning trash barrel, Map Marker - East of Whiterun
[/size][size=3][b][u]NOTE![/u][/b] 
As I said the weapons are really strong. ( damage 75 )[/size][size=3]I can do an update to lower their strength upon request.[/size][size=3]Mossad weapons are 1 handed axe - sword - hammer - Bow - crossbow[/size][size=3]Re-spawning container of bolts for Mossad crossbow in Master bedroom also.[/size][size=3]If I have to or upon request, I can do 2 handed.
I did navmesh the inside also but how I did? Let me know please. 
[/size][size=3][b][color=#ff0000]Requirements[/color][/b]
[/size][size=3][b]Dawnguard - Dragonborn[/b] 
[/size][color=#e69138][size=3][i][b]Ghosu weapon pack, install this mod first.[/b][/i][/size][/color][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b]Install 
[/b][/size][size=3]Copy my meshes, textures, and both esp's to your data file and
allow to overwrite when asked.
[/size][size=3][b]Conflicts[/b]
I have tested this several times and all is working fine,[/size][size=3]but let me know if ANY textures, meshes are missing or of any conflicts.
There should not be any problems though. Don't no about Lore either.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b]Credit[/b]
[/size][size=3]Ghosu, Tamira & Phitt for their fine resources.[/size][size=3]Myself & Bethesda as always.[/size][size=3] [/size][size=3][b]Tools used[/b]
[/size][size=3]Gimp, Photoscape, mspaint, Nifscope[/size][size=3]
[/size][b][size=3]Enjoy [color=#7f6000]([/color]=[color=#38761d]>[/color]_[color=#38761d]<[/color]=[color=#7f6000])[/color][/size][/b][/center]
author: xXxAlfaOmegaXxX
